name: Extra Trash
description:
Created in 72hrs for Ludum Dare 42 by Jacob Bashista and Nicholas Smart Extra Trash explores Low Earth Orbit as you battle it out with the continuous stream of Trash coming from Earth. Make sure to protect your Satellites and keep your trash organized.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Click - Pickup and Place Trash

Mouse controls direction of Robot

Protect your Satellites and monitor Rooster.

Credits:

Programming - Jacob Bashista

Modeling - Nicholas Smart

Audio Engineering - Jacob Bashista

Sound Effects and Music - Nicholas Smart (Using only his mouth)
